Dr. Phillips

Paddywagon is the perfect Irish pub experience near Orlando. Whether you‚Äôre looking to have a night out with your best mates or host your next big event, Paddywagon offers plenty of space and entertainment options.

OUR PURPOSE IS SIMPLE
To provide your group with a fun and unique experience in a truly authentic and upscale local Irish bar space.
HOST YOUR NEXT EVENT AT PADDYWAGON
Looking for a place to bring your small group of friends? Looking for a place to bring your team after a meeting or event? Paddywagon offers two incredible venue options for you. Paddywagon Lake Buena Vista and Paddywagon Dr. Phillips are both available for small groups of friends or full facility buyouts for private and corporate events. Nothing says friends, family, and a great time like a pint or a cocktail at an Irish pub, so let‚Äôs discuss options. We are happy to assist the planning of catering, lighting, audio, video, and other resources that you to create a memorable experience for you and your group. For more information, please call us or take a minute to fill out the form below and a member of our team will respond within 24 hours.
Doctor Phillips
Looking for the perfect venue for your next gathering? Whether it's a small group of friends or a large corporate event, Paddywagon offers two incredible venue options in Dr. Phillips and Lake Buena Vista. We are happy to assist with planning catering, lighting, audio, video, and other resources to create a memorable experience for you and your group. For more information, please call us or fill out the form below, and a member of our team will respond within 24 hours.
Take a tour of our location
here!
Lake Buena Vista
Paddywagon Lake Buena Vista officially opened in December 2019! This new location is upscale and located in a place mostly known for being the mailing address for Walt Disney World. This Irish bar location is also very close to the Orlando Orange County Convention Center and Lake Buena Vista Downtown Disney hotels. Although this location sits in the heart of a tourist town, it has the local, neighborhood feel you're looking for. This location caters to large and small party groups.
Take a tour of our location
here!
Venue Specifications
Square Footage
Each of our locations in Dr. Phillips and Lake Buena Vista boasts approximately 2400 square feet of indoor space, complemented by an additional 1250 square feet of beautiful outdoor patio area.
Standard maximum capacity is 250 guests, ensuring ample space for events of various sizes.
Food & Catering
While we do not have a kitchen, we collaborate with numerous external catering companies to fulfill your specific culinary needs.
No additional fees are charged for bringing your own caterer, and we can provide a preferred and recommended list of caterers.
Holiday Parties & Special Events
Our venues serve as versatile canvases for your events. Whether you‚Äôre planning a holiday party or a unique themed event, we offer the perfect setting.
We understand that hosting an event inside a hotel ballroom can be extremely difficult and expensive. We provide you with a different option: a great space with great customer service in two great locations.
Parking
We offer plenty of free, self-parking for our guests and groups, with additional options like bus drop-offs and event valet services.
Locations
Doctor Phillips:
Located on Sand Lake Road, along the famed Restaurant Row. Ideal for gatherings before or after an evening in the area.
https://my.matterport.com/show/?m=mpuxL7nzn6K
Lake Buena Vista:
Located very close to the Orlando Orange County Convention Center and Lake Buena Vista Downtown Disney hotel. Although this location sits in the heart of a tourist town, it has the local, neighborhood feel you‚Äôre looking for.
https://my.matterport.com/show/?m=xW572NzyzcR
Both locations feature similar layouts, including pool tables, darts, and Golden Tee, and are available for virtual tours.
Audio Visual Capabilities
Equipped with a projector and large screen for all events.
Our built-in audio system is available for use, and we can work with local providers for larger capacity or additional equipment needs.

Welcome to Paddywagon Irish Pub
At Paddywagon Irish Pub, we offer a new twist on an old favorite, combining the warmth and charm of a traditional Irish pub with an upscale, inviting atmosphere. With two prime locations in Southwest Orlando‚ÄîDr. Phillips and Lake Buena Vista‚Äîwe provide an authentic Irish experience that is perfect for both locals and tourists.
Mike Hunsucker is the Managing Partner of Paddywagon Orlando. With over 15 years of experience in the hospitality industry, Mike saw a need for a 'hospitality bar' in the Dr. Phillips and Lake Buena Vista areas. Mike's commitment to the community and his hands-on approach ensure that every visit to Paddywagon feels like coming home.
Explore Paddywagon
Our Locations
Paddywagon Doctor Phillips
Located in the vibrant Dellagio Town Center, just minutes from International Drive, Paddywagon Dr. Phillips is the local neighborhood Irish bar you‚Äôve been searching for. Situated near Sand Lake Road and the Orlando Orange County Convention Center, our pub offers a cozy, welcoming environment away from the hustle and bustle of crowded tourist spots. Whether you call Orlando home or are visiting, Paddywagon Dr. Phillips is your go-to spot for a relaxed evening with friends, a pint of your favorite beer, or a private event.
Learn More
Paddywagon Lake Buena Vista
Opened in December 2019, Paddywagon Lake Buena Vista brings an upscale Irish pub experience to an area known for its proximity to Walt Disney World. Located close to the Orlando Orange County Convention Center and the bustling Downtown Disney hotels, this location combines the excitement of a tourist hotspot with the familiarity of a neighborhood pub. Ideal for both daily visits and special occasions, Paddywagon Lake Buena Vista is a gathering place for family, friends, and visitors looking to enjoy the best of Irish hospitality.
Learn More
